          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The science of evolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wissenschaft der Entwicklung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La science de l'évolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ciência da evolução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di sviluppo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιστήμη της εξέλιξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ciencia de la evolución</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit debates the issues surrounding the science of evolution and religion.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit debattiert die Ausgaben, welche 
die Wissenschaft der Entwicklung und der Religion umgeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité discute les issues entourant la 
science de l'évolution et de la religion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade debate as edições que cercam a 
ciência da evolução e da religião.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità dibatte le edizioni che circondano la
scienza di sviluppo e della religione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα συζητά τα ζητήματα που περιβάλλουν την

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad discute las ediciones que rodean la
